description: I. Letter dated 11/03/2010 from Katie Pettifer (Northern Ireland Office) to Peter O'Neill (Chief Executive, Northern Ireland Human Rights Commission) regarding the 2010/11 budget allocation. 2 p. II. Correspondence dated 15/02/2010 and 19/02/2010 between Paul Goggins MP and Prof. Monica McWilliams (Chief Commissioner, NIHRC) regarding the accommodation of under 18 year old boys in Hydebank Wood Young Offenders Centre. 4 p. III. Letter [undated and names redacted] regarding proposals to regrade posts at the Northern Ireland Human Rights Commission following job evaluation. 7 p. IV. Correspondence dated 23/02/2010 and 24/02/2010 between Prof. Monica McWilliams to Jonathan Phillips (NIO) regarding budget allocation. 3 p.
